name: Goblins Keep Coming - Tower Defense
description: 'Goblins Keep Coming' is an Endless 3D Tower Defense where hordes of Goblins won't stop coming! Protect your castle against bombers, warriors and kings. Evolve your defenses as the enemies won't stop sending bigger and stronger troops from different locations on the landscape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or newer Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with Direct X 9 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or newer Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with Direct X 9 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
